From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To create a new directory in a Flash file system, use the **mkdir disk0:** command.

ParaDef.Info: This commmand has no arguments or keywords.

ExtraInfo: This command is valid only on Flash file systems.After you enter the **mkdir disk0:** command, you are prompted to enter the new directory filename.To check your entry, enter the **dir** command.To remove a directory, enter the **rmdir** command.

RelatedCmds.description: Changes the default directory or file system.
Displays a list of files on a file system.
Removes an existing directory in a Class C Flash file system.
